medical_history.chief_complaint: Swelling of the left knee due to fungal infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a 10-month history of swelling after puncturing his knee with a carpet tack. There were no signs of warmth or tenderness, but the physical examination revealed a fluid-filled prepatellar bursa.
medical_history.social_history: Carpet layer, history of alcohol abuse.
